name: Money $pin
overview: Each player takes turns guessing letters to try to solve a word. Each turn, the player can purchase a vowel, take a spin on a slot machine to determine the value of their consonants, or try to solve the puzzle. Players can chose to have previously guessed letters displayed or not, and players can make their own custom word sets. The first player to guess he word wins the round, and keeps their money for the next round.
